publicationStmt.p: Cluster of Excellence Asia and Europe in a Global Context

sourceDesc.p: extract of term data from WSC

editorialDecl.p: Translation and tranliteration for each entry come from the print sources. If the sources ommit either one, project members supplied them inside brackets "()".
Comments on ambigous tranliterations appear inside a note element.
"â–¡" as placeholder for illegible or unkown characters is a direct transcription from the source database.
some entries have falsly been declared as being in german in the source database. These errors are still present.
